sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-skills-box-list', templateUrl: './skills-box-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./skills-box-list.component.css'] }) export class SkillsBoxListComponent { listOfTitles = [ "Bases de données", "Langues", ] listOfLogos = [ "database.png", "database.png", ] listOfSkills = [ ["MySql", "Symfony"], ["Français", "Anglais"] ] listOfSkillLogos = [ ["assets/logos/mysql.png", "assets/logos/symfony.jpg", "assets/logos/phpmyadmin.png"], ["assets/logos/french.png", "assets/logos/english.png", "assets/logos/german.png"], ] }
